Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.gui

Class GUIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.gui.GUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter<ViewEvent>
public class GUIView extends View
The specific class for the graphical user interface. It handles scenes changes, based on both the GameStatus and the ClientState. It keeps references to all the scene-specific controllers:
  • CONNECTION_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.NOT_CONNECTED
  • AUTH_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.NOT_AUTHENTICATED
  • GAME_LIST_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.AUTHENTICATED
  • LOBBY_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus is GameStatus.AWAITING_PLAYERS
  • STARTING_CARD_SIDE_CHOICE_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus is GameStatus.SETUP_STARTING_CARD_SIDE
  • PLAYER_COLOR_CHOICE_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus is GameStatus.SETUP_COLOR
  • OBJECTIVE_CHOICE_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus is GameStatus.SETUP_OBJECTIVE
  • PLAY_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus can be:
    • GameStatus.PLAY
    • GameStatus.SECOND_LAST_TURN
    • GameStatus.LAST_TURN
    • GameStatus.SUSPENDED
  • RESTORING_LOBBY_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus is GameStatus.RESTORING
  • ENDING_CONTROLLER: it handles the scene when the ClientState is ClientState.IN_GAME and the GameStatus is GameStatus.FINISHED
